info.description: The API details of the Oracle Commerce Cloud.
info.title: Oracle Commerce Cloud Store API

get.description: List Addresses. This operation is used to get the list of addresses of an organization.Optionally takes the X-CCOrganization header  to specify current Organization context of logged in user.

200.description: Following model is returned when operation succeeds.

default.description:
The error response.
 The following are the internal error codes thrown by this API when the request processing fails in Oracle Commerce Cloud:


|Error Code|Description|
|------------------|------------------|
|100191|Invalid query param.|
|100000|If input passed is invalid|
|100001|If there was no organization found with the given id|

parameters.name: include
parameters.description: Query string to get all/inherited secondaryAddresses. "all"/"inheritedOnly" are the only allowed values. If include is not specified, secondaryAddresses of that organization is returned. If value of include is "all" , then secondaryAddresses of that organization as well as secondaryAddresses of parent organizations is returned. Whereas in case of "inheritedOnly", secondaryAddresses of parentOrganization is returned.

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: This field determines the offset/starting index from which data to be fetched.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: This is the field to determine number of records to be fetched per REST call.

parameters.name: includeCustomProperties
parameters.description: The custom properties for the addresses will be returned if this is set to true.Custom properties will also be returned if queryFormat/addressType/q/sort is specified. There is no significance for this property if any of these properties are specified queryFormat/addressType/q/sort

parameters.name: orgId
parameters.description: Organization Id whose addresses has to be fetched

parameters.name: q
parameters.description: SCIM query to search on the address properties. Search on all the address possible except repositoryId and addressType

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: This is the field to provide sort on the address properties except addressType.

parameters.name: addressType
parameters.description: Exact nick name to search. Wild card/Partial / Case insensitive search is not supported

parameters.name: queryFormat
parameters.description: queryFormat to search on the address properties. Possible values SCIM or null.

parameters.name: totalResults
parameters.description: Tells whether to include total and totalResults in the SCIM query.By default the value is true

parameters.name: X-CCOrganization
parameters.description: Current organization context of the logged in user
